data.quote: Rock and roll keeps you in a constant state of juvenile delinquency.
data.author: Eddie Spaghetti

data.quote: I’d rather be dead than cool.
data.author: Kurt Cobain

data.quote: Darling, my attitude is ‘fuck it’; I’m doing everything with everyone.
data.author: Freddie Mercury

data.quote: Society has traditionally always tried to find scapegoats for its problems. Well here I am.
data.author: Marilyn Manson

data.quote: I could never quite understand cocaine, you can’t get a hard on, you can’t sleep and you grind your teeth, what the fuck is good about that?
data.author: Jon Bon Jovi

data.quote: We believed that anything that was worth doing was worth overdoing.
data.author: Steven Tyler

data.quote: I used to jog but the ice cubes kept falling out of my glass.
data.author: Dave Lee Roth

data.quote: Just because I cut the heads off dolls doesn’t mean I hate babies, I just hate dolls.
data.author: Alice Cooper

data.quote: Metallica fans sided with Napster because they’re lazy bastards and they want everything for free, I like playing music because it’s a good living and I get satisfaction from it but I can’t feed my family with satisfaction.
data.author: James Hetfield

data.quote: I think record companies are criminals.
data.author: Jon Bon Jovi

data.quote: I love all women, I will never stop, I want every girl that ever lived. I fuck everything that moves and if it doesn’t move… we work something out.
data.author: Gene Simmons

data.quote: I think they trivialize what we do and punk rock in general. It’s like throwing shit in the face of something or someone that had substance at one point.
data.author: Mike Dirnt

data.quote: I’m a family oriented guy; I’ve personally started four or five this year.
data.author: David Lee Roth

data.quote: I’m not a woman. I’m a force of nature.
data.author: Courtney Love

data.quote: Keith Moon, God rest his soul, once drove his car through the glass doors of a hotel, driving all the way up to the reception desk, got out and asked for the key to his room.
data.author: Pete Townshend

data.quote: When I die, sprinkle my ashes over the 80’s.
data.author: David Lee Roth

data.quote: What has drug addiction done for me? It’s cost me my career, my fortune and basically my sex life when I found out I was HIV positive…
data.author: Robbin Crosby

data.quote: Rock and roll is a nuclear blast of reality in a mundane world where no-one is allowed to be magnificent.
data.author: Kim Fowley

data.quote: I hope the guy who came up with the phrase 'sex, drugs and rock ‘n’ roll' rots in hell, I’d like to change it so it makes more sense: ‘sex death and rock ‘n’ roll’
data.author: Gene Simmons

data.quote: Kiss is like a smell in a paper bag, they just never go away
data.author: Dee Snider
